subject: Re: [junit] Unit testing endless loops
msgSnippet: ... What were the conditions that lead to the endless loop, and could you test for those? Bill de hÓra
messageBody:
Mark Derricutt wrote:
> I just came accross some code today that was getting trapped into an
> endless loop under certain circumstances, it was a simple bug which is
> fixed without any tests ( naughty me ), but afterwards I was thinking about
> how I would test it, but my brains come to a standing point...
>
> Any simple way of testing these sorts of things?

What were the conditions that lead to the endless loop, and could
you test for those?

Bill de hÓra
